attributes.action: Prioritise British Citizens Over Illegal Immigrants for Housing and Support
attributes.additional_details: It is a disgrace that illegal immigrants—who have broken the law to be here—are given free housing while British citizens, veterans, and working families sleep on the streets. This country should not reward criminality. If we can house lawbreakers, we have no excuse for failing our own people.
attributes.background: Immediately stop housing and supporting illegal immigrants. Enforce removals without delay. Prioritise housing and services for British citizens and legal residents. No one should be rewarded for breaking the law by entering or staying in the UK illegally.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

All UK homeless citizens should be prioritised for hotel accommodation
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/729887
